# Q 2.1
```{r}
A <- matrix(c(4,2,3,7,5,8), 
            nrow = 2, 
            ncol = 3,
            byrow = TRUE)

B <- matrix(c(3,-2,4,6,9,-5), 
            nrow = 2, 
            ncol = 3,
            byrow = TRUE)

is.matrix(A)
is.matrix(B)
```

```{r}
#find A + B 
A + B

#and A - B
A - B
```

```{r}
#find A'A 
t(A) %*% A

#and AA'
A %*% t(A)
```

# Q 2.2
```{r}
#Find (A + B)' 
t(A + B)

#and A' + B' 
t(A) + t(B)

#and compare them, thus illustrating (2.15).
(t(A + B)) - (t(A) + t(B))
```

```{r}
#Show that (A')' = A, thus illustrating (2.6).
A
t(t(A))

A - t(t(A))
```
